company.CpyBannerColorText: ... is displayed if no company banner is selected and in mobile version.
company.SelAssFilterBehaviour: Define filter behaviour for multiple series assignments of the same course

company.AssFiBehNoFilter: No filter - Employees have to complete every course series defined

company.LeaderAssignedCourse: assign only courses they are also allowed to view/edit.

Are you sure that you want to proceed?

scorm.UploadFailed: Uploading SCORM course failed! (Did you upload a valid SCORM course in *.zip file format?)
scorm.DBCommunicationFail: Error communicating with database. Please refresh!
scorm.UploadingScorm:
Uploading SCORM course...
(This may take several minutes depending on your internet connection)

assignment.Time: Time span to complete the course (days)
assignment.MandatoryExp: The course will be displayed as mandatory to complete to the employee.
assignment.VoluntaryExp: The course will be displayed as voluntary to complete to the employee.
assignment.NotEffective: This series assignment is not effective due to another series assignment. You can change the filter for multiple series assignments in your settings.
assignment.DeleteCourseAssFull: Are you sure that you want to delete this course assignment of course {{course}} from this group?
assignment.DeleteDirectCourseAssFull: Are you sure that you want to delete this personal course assignment of course {{course}} for {{name}}?
assignment.DeleteGlobalAssFull: Are you sure that you want to delete this global course assignment of course {{course}}?
assignment.CatchUpG: Group members assigned to this group after the first date
assignment.CatchUpD: Department members assigned to this department after the first date
assignment.CatchUpExp: are assigned to this course instantly.
assignment.NotCatchUpExp: are assigned to this course on the next iteration.
assignment.Priority: Define priority of this series (just important if global filter in settings other than 'no-filter')
assignment.TreatLikeOthers: This series should be treated like a department or group series assignment.
assignment.TreatPriority: This series should be prioritized over department and group series assignements.
assignment.IncludeSubDeps: Apply this course assignment also for sub-departments
assignment.ParentAss: This assignment was defined at the higher level department "{{parent}}".

register.StartNow: Get started with your free and nonbinding Smart-Study demo account
register.MailAlreadyUsed: Email address already linked to an account.
register.Cond1: I accept the general terms and conditions of Smart-Study GmbH.
register.Cond2: I agree to the processing of my data in accordance with the data protection regulations and the terms and conditions.
register.Cond3: I agree to be contacted by Smart-Study GmbH for marketing purposes.
register.DefaultError: An unknown error occurred. Please retry.
register.ThankYouInfo:
Thank you for your registration!

Your demo system is being prepared. You will get your access credentials via mail as soon as we are done.

Your individual demo system is available for you for one month and is deleted automatically afterwards.

Enjoy trying out Smart-Study!

registrations.SumReg: {{sum}} demo accounts registered at the moment.
